title: Oscar nominations 2023: The full list
content: This video can not be playedOscars 2023: The best picture contenders in 40 secondsThe race is on for this year's Oscars, honouring the film industry's finest from the past 12 months.Here is the full list of the nominees of the 95th Academy Awards, which will be handed out at the ceremony in Los Angeles on 12 March.This video can not be playedWATCH: Guillermo del Toro reacts to his Oscar nomination
